name: Sixteen's Darling, Pleasant, All Around Lovely Morning Stroll
name_original: Sixteen's Darling, Pleasant, All Around Lovely Morning Stroll
description:
You are Sixteen, an experimental bio-weapon created by the most unholy of science. But just because you disassemble everyone you touch on a molecular level, doesn't mean you don't know how to have a good time! Destruction is your purpose, but love is your passion.

Say hi to the scientists! Take in the view! And enjoy your morning stroll!

This Game was made by:

  • Billy Dent/VoydVoyd - Programming, level design
  • Booniepig - Art, level design
  • Mifflegriff - Music
